entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
